definition: lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
(TCM) pulse feeling and palpitation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
